com.ABCjobs.communityportal.ABCJobsPteLtd.Repository

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Integer>

    @Repository
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>
    UserRepository --- Data Access Object responsible for interacting with table User
    Author:
    John Daniel Tejero

List<User> searchbyName(@Param(value="name")

        custom abstract method along with custom query used to search for user's name Retrieves user record by means of user first name or last name.

User loginCheck(@Param(value="email")

      • changePass

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="update User u set u.password = :password where u.emailAddress = :email")
void changePass(@Param(value="password")
                                                                                                                     String pass,
                                                                                                                     @Param(value="email")
                                                                                                                     String email)
        Custom abstract method with custom query that updates user password Modifying annotation specifies that the query will change a data from the record Selecting a record from which to update password by means of email.
        Parameters:
        String - pass A string which will replace the old password
        String - email A string which specify which user record to be updated

        Custom abstract method with custom query that selects user from user table Record is selected by using user ID as selector.
